instructionsModal.title: How to Use
instructionsModal.playerBar.selectPlayer: Tap a player disk once to select it (a yellow ring will appear). You can then tap on the field to place/move them.
instructionsModal.playerBar.deselectPlay: Tap the currently selected player disk again to deselect it.
instructionsModal.playerBar.renamePlayer: Double-tap (or double-click) a player disk in the bar to edit its name. Press Enter or click away to save.
instructionsModal.playerBar.renameTeam: Double-tap (or double-click) the Team Name (e.g., "My Team") to edit it.
instructionsModal.playerBar.scrollBar: Swipe horizontally on the bar itself (including on player disks) to scroll if players overflow.
instructionsModal.fieldArea.movePlayer: Click/touch and drag a player or opponent marker already on the field.
instructionsModal.fieldArea.addPlacePlay: After selecting a player from the top bar (yellow ring), tap on the field to place them at that location.
instructionsModal.fieldArea.removePlayer: Double-tap (or double-click) directly on a player or opponent marker on the field to remove it.
instructionsModal.fieldArea.drawLines: Click/touch and drag on an empty area of the field to draw lines.
instructionsModal.controlBar.toggleNames: Show/hide player names on field disks.
instructionsModal.timerOverlay.setInterv: Use the +/- buttons to set the desired substitution interval.
instructionsModal.timerOverlay.subAlerts: The background will turn orange (1 min before) and red when the interval is reached.
instructionsModal.timerOverlay.confirmSu: Click "Substitution Made" after completing subs. Logs duration, resets alert.
instructionsModal.general.touchInteracti: Many actions use double-tap on touch devices (rename, remove from field). Tap player in bar to select/deselect.
instructionsModal.general.saving: Changes are saved automatically to browser storage.
instructionsModal.general.fullscreen: Fullscreen button is in the bottom control bar.
instructionsModal.closeText: Click outside the box or the 'X' to close.
